2016.tpci.bunnelby.bundle.3: The Ω Barrage Ancient Trait means that Bunnelby attacks twice a turn! This extended-art Pokémon card also comes with card sleeves, a Pikachu coin, and a 10-card booster pack from the Pokémon TCG: XY—Steam Siege expansion!
2016.tpci.bunnelby.bundle.4: This bundle contains: 1 Bunnelby Pokémon card (XY—Primal Clash, 121/160) 1 Pokémon TCG: XY—Steam Siege booster pack (10-card) Card sleeves A Pikachu coin These cards are legal for Standard format tournaments and competition. This offer runs through June 6, 2017. This bundle is only available in the Pokémon TCG Online and is not sold in retail stores as a physical product.
